questions.text: What's a repetitive task you wish you didn't have to do?
follow_ups: How often do you have to do this?
How much time does it typically take?
What would you do with that time instead?

questions.text: Where do you feel your time is being wasted during your workday?
follow_ups: Can you give me a specific example?
Who else is affected by this?
Have you found any workarounds?

questions.text: What's one thing you often have to chase people or systems for?
follow_ups: How long do these delays typically last?
What's the impact when you don't get it on time?
Who usually helps resolve this?

questions.text: Where do members get stuck, confused, or frustrated when dealing with us?
follow_ups: How do you usually help them through this?
How often does this come up?
What do members say about this issue?

questions.text: What could make our service faster or more personalised for members?
follow_ups: What specific member needs are we not meeting?
Can you share an example where this would help?
What feedback have members given about this?

questions.text: What decisions are hard to make due to lack of data or clarity?
follow_ups: What information would help you make this decision?
How do you currently work around this gap?
How often does this situation arise?

questions.text: If you could get one new insight instantly about your work, what would it be?
follow_ups: How would this insight change your approach?
Who else would benefit from this information?
What decisions would this help you make?

questions.text: If you had a smart assistant that understood your role, what would you want it to do for you?
follow_ups: Which of these tasks is most time-consuming?
How would this change your daily routine?
What skills would this assistant need?

questions.text: If you could change one system or process overnight, what would it be?
follow_ups: What makes the current system problematic?
Who would benefit most from this change?
Have you seen this work better elsewhere?
